item.name: Environment Setup: 1) Create New Environment (top right), 2) Select Pre-req tab & set bearer token, 3) Click Send

request.description:
Setup your access token for all further requests. Don't have one? Contact (mailto:help@tsheets.com). You should only need to run this one time as these values will be stored in your Postman environment.

Select the Pre-request Script tab in the middle of the screen and replace {{tsheets-bearer-token}} with your access token value. Click the Send button at top left and then select Test Results mid-screen to confirm success. Now your access token will automatically be added as an HTTP header to the API method calls to authenticate to your account. (See Authentication for details). e.g.:

postman.setEnvironmentVariable("tsheets-bearer-token", "S.7__645f34c0...");
